title: Did you know?
content:
Unique ID Generation:

The ID for each post is generated based on the current number of entries in the JSON file. This ensures that the IDs are incremented sequentially.
The new_id = len(existing_data) + 1 line calculates the new ID by getting the length of the current list of posts and adding 1.

title: Did you know?
content: Unique ID Generation: The ID for each post is generated based on the current number of entries in the JSON file. This ensures that the IDs are incremented sequentially. The new_id = len(existing_data) + 1 line calculates the new ID <b> by getting the length of the current <b> list of posts and adding 1.
